Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: Close the current Web Component Pop-up.

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: Update the current Web Component Pop-up title

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: The internal name (<Control>.InternalName) of any control of the Web Component. This control is used to identify the Drop Down Component.

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: Close the current Drop Down Component from an Event of the Web Component.

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: The serialized Json of an instance of the options SDT WWPBaseObjects.WWPDateRangePickerOptions (&Options.ToJson()).

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: Update the options of a particular DateTime picker.

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: Simulates the Button Click when the Enter key is pressed on the Textarea (without pressing Shift or Alt key).

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: The internal name (<Control>.InternalName) of any control of the Web Component. This control is used to identify the Detail Web Component.

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: Refresh the Grid after closing the Detail Web Component

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: Closes the Detail Web Component from an action inside the Web Component

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: The internal name (<Control>.InternalName) of any control of the Web Component. This control is used to identify the Popover.

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: Refresh the Web Panel after closing the Popover

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: Closes the Popover from an action inside the Web Component

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: The internal name (<Control>.InternalName) of any control of the Web Panel/Web Component. This control is used to identify Web Panel or Web Component in which the Tabs control is placed.

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: Whether the caption is HTML or simple text

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: Edit the caption of a tab

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: The internal name (<Control>.InternalName) of the control to apply the mask.

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: If True, the mask will be applied from right to left

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: Applies a mask to a specific control.

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: The internal name (<Control>.InternalName) of the control to apply the mask.

Property.Name: ExoItemDesc
Property.Value: Applies one of the specified masks (depending on the length) to a specific control.

Object.name: WorkWithPlusWizardStepsVerticalWC
Object.description: Work With Plus Wizard Steps Vertical WC

Object.name: WorkWithPlusWizardStepsUnderlineWC
Object.description: Work With Plus Wizard Steps Underline WC

Object.name: WorkWithPlusWizardStepsLineWC
Object.description: Work With Plus Wizard Steps Line WC

Object.name: WorkWithPlusWizardStepsProgressWC
Object.description: Work With Plus Wizard Steps Progress WC

Part.Source:
Event Start
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
&MaxStepsToShow = 8 &MaxStepsToShowInXS = 5
&SelectedStepNumber = 1 For &WizardStep in &WizardSteps If &WizardStep.Code = &CurrentStep If &WizardStep.Description <> '' WizardStepDescription.Caption = &WizardStep.Description Else WizardStepDescription.Visible = False Endif Exit Else &SelectedStepNumber += 1 Endif Endfor &StepRealNumber = 1
&WizardStepsAux = &WizardSteps.Clone() &FirstIsDummy = False &SecondIsDummy = False &PenultimateIsDummy = False &LastIsDummy = False If &WizardStepsAux.Count > &MaxStepsToShow If &SelectedStepNumber > &WizardStepsAux.Count &SelectedStepNumber = 1 EndIf &StartIndex = 1 If &SelectedStepNumber + 3 - &MaxStepsToShow / 2 > 0 &StartIndex = &SelectedStepNumber + 3 - &MaxStepsToShow / 2 If &StartIndex + (&MaxStepsToShow - 2) > &WizardStepsAux.Count + 1 &StartIndex = &WizardStepsAux.Count - (&MaxStepsToShow - 2) + 1 EndIf EndIf If &StartIndex > 3 &StepRealNumber = &StartIndex &FirstIsDummy = True &SecondIsDummy = True &WizardStepsAux.Item(2).Title = !'...' Do while &StartIndex > 3 &WizardStepsAux.Remove(3) &StartIndex -= 1 &SelectedStepNumber -= 1 Enddo EndIf
If &WizardStepsAux.Count > &MaxStepsToShow &LastIsDummy = True &PenultimateIsDummy = True &WizardStepsAux.Item(&WizardStepsAux.Count - 1).Title = '' Do while &WizardStepsAux.Count > &MaxStepsToShow &WizardStepsAux.Remove(&WizardStepsAux.Count - 2) Enddo EndIf EndIf
&WizardStepsCount = &WizardStepsAux.Count If &WizardStepsAux.Count > &MaxStepsToShowInXS &WizardStepsItem = new() &WizardStepsItem.Title = !"DummiesXS_Test" &WizardStepsItem.Code = !"FirstDummyXS" &WizardStepsAux.Add(&WizardStepsItem, 2)
&WizardStepsItem = new() &WizardStepsItem.Title = !"DummiesXS_Test" &WizardStepsItem.Code = !"LastDummyXS" &WizardStepsAux.Add(&WizardStepsItem, &WizardStepsAux.Count - 1) EndIf &StepNumber = 1
EndEvent
Event GridWizardSteps.Load
For &WizardStep In &WizardStepsAux &WizardStepTitle = &WizardStep.Title
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */
//this code should be inside the For Each used to load the grid
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
StepNumber.Caption = &StepRealNumber.ToFormattedString() TblContainerStep.Class = ThemeClass:TableContainerStepUnderline TableStepItem.Class = ThemeClass:TableStepUnderline TableStepItem.Visible = True
Do Case Case &StepNumber < &SelectedStepNumber UnnamedTableFSGridWizardSteps.Class = !'Table CompletedStep' Case &StepNumber = &SelectedStepNumber UnnamedTableFSGridWizardSteps.Class = !'Table CurrentStep' Otherwise UnnamedTableFSGridWizardSteps.Class = !'Table RemainingStep' EndCase
If &SelectedStepNumber <> &StepNumber And &WizardStep.Code <> !"FirstDummyXS" And &WizardStep.Code <> !"LastDummyXS" And &StepNumber > 1 And &StepNumber < &WizardStepsCount If &SelectedStepNumber <= 3 And &StepNumber > 3 TblContainerStep.Class = TblContainerStep.Class + !" hidden-xs" Endif If &SelectedStepNumber > 3 And &StepNumber > 1 And &SelectedStepNumber < &WizardStepsCount - 2 TblContainerStep.Class = TblContainerStep.Class + !" hidden-xs" Endif If &SelectedStepNumber >= &WizardStepsCount - 2 And &StepNumber < &WizardStepsCount - 2 TblContainerStep.Class = TblContainerStep.Class + !" hidden-xs" Endif EndIf
TblContainerStep.Visible = True If Not &WizardStep.Code.Contains(!"DummyXS") Do Case Case &StepNumber = 1 AND &FirstIsDummy StepNumber.Caption = &StepNumber.ToString().Trim() Case &StepNumber = &WizardStepsCount AND &LastIsDummy StepNumber.Caption = &WizardSteps.Count.ToString().Trim() Case (&StepNumber = &WizardStepsCount - 1 AND &PenultimateIsDummy) StepNumber.Caption = !'...' TableStepItem.Class += !" TableStepUnderlineExtraBullet" Case &StepNumber = 2 AND &FirstIsDummy TableStepItem.Visible = False TblContainerStep.Class = TblContainerStep.Class + " TableContainerUnderlineExtraBullet" Otherwise &StepRealNumber += 1 EndCase &StepNumber += 1 Else StepNumber.Caption = !"..." TblContainerStep.Class = TblContainerStep.Class + " TableContainerUnderlineExtraBullet hidden-sm hidden-lg hidden-md" If (&SelectedStepNumber <= 3 And &WizardStep.Code = !"FirstDummyXS") Or (&SelectedStepNumber >= &WizardStepsCount - 2 And &WizardStep.Code = !"LastDummyXS") TblContainerStep.Visible = False TableStepItem.Class = ThemeClass:TableStepUnderlineExtra EndIf If (&SelectedStepNumber > 3 And &WizardStep.Code = !"FirstDummyXS") TableStepItem.Class = ThemeClass:TableStepExtraUnderlineChecked StepNumber.Visible = true EndIf EndIf Load EndFor
EndEvent
